thread.title: Donald

author: Donald
title: Donald
text:
Received my hardcover copy of, Buffalo Soldiers In Italy-Black Americans In World War II, which turned out to be a July 31, 1992, signed copy by the author Hondon B. Hargrove. As an African-American, Marine Corps Infantryman(Kilo Co,3rdBn 4thMarine Regiment, 3rdMarine Division-Vietnam 1969), I am an avid US military history reader and it was an honor to receive this part of our country's military history.
Sincerely,
Donald R. Brown
